locations.title: Geneva Truck Stop
locations.content: Geneva Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: They give you a shower for free with a 50 gal fuel purchase but then they charge you for the use of a towel and wash clothe however I do not mind paying the $3 (big fluffy towel) if it helps support a mom and pop style stop.  The lady ‚Ä¶

Always stop at Geneva Truck Stop! Lovely people, clean bathrooms and the coffee is great! Did you know for 50 gals of diesel you can use the shower for free!!! How awesome is that! They also have a room for games and internet.

This place is peaceful and quite!!!!! I have had enough of lot expensive pilots and flying Js‚Ä¶. Clean bathroom here clean shower‚Äôs plenty of parking easily fit 150+ 18 wheelers. Hot coffee  it‚Äôs off a river banks too stay here it‚Äôs great
FREE parking, $12 CLEAN shower and KIND staff, I love it here lol such a GREAT find
Friendly people working here, plenty of parking and clean bathroom and shower!
These guys appreciate truckers. Small place, but cheap laundry, and clean shower... I'll stop everytime I'm in the area.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ to TA regularly for fuel with our semi truck and also use our rewards card. After fueling, we went to get a shower, but the kiosk at this location was not working properly. We were able to sign in, but it wouldn‚Äôt print a shower receipt. ‚Ä¶

Most days a truck driver best part , is to stop and shower . This TA is clean except for the dirty toilet seat . The two towels is always plus . Some TA only give you one which I don‚Äôt know why truck drivers spend a whole lot of money on ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ no more sit down restaurant here anymore, that‚Äôs permanently closed. I use the handicap shower downstairs, and it was clean enough, but the water pressure wasn‚Äôt great. Bathrooms were usually clean, as clean as they could be considering ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ can barely afford to be out here.. I spent out of pocket (I dont have the luxury of big company money.) 400 for a damn service. And I can't even get a shower. I still have to pay 15 dollors. Ok rant over. As for this particular TA, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The ladies restroom was very clean. I did not shower or eat here to be able to comment on that but overall I have a positive view of this location. The TV room is upstairs with 3 rows of chairs, a trash can and some folding chairs. The ‚Ä¶
Shower's are clean! Good food, pretty server.  Parking for truckers is pretty good. Only bad thing is bathroom is kinda dirty.
Was a good place... Powerful shower with plenty of hot water. Strong Wi-Fi signal [probably wasn't too many users].

üåüüåüCLEAN SHOWERSüåüüåü.... showers upstairs,  water HOT great water pressure....ask for extra towels because the ENTIRE shower steams... By the time you're done even the door handle is wet.... ‚Ä¶
Very clean shower and hot water good service
don't know how to ask (use their mouth )if you are in the shower

locations.title: Truck World
locations.content: Truck World may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Fuel about 40 cents cheaper than the  Loves across the street, lots of parking with ease of maneuverability, and nicest showers I‚Äôve ever seen with the shower heads hanging from the ceiling all equals five stars.

Stopped to grab a shower and was really impressed. Clean and tidy the shower was hot and had good pressure . The towels were like you get at home. They have good food as well. The ladies up front were nice. Plenty of truck parking.  I'll ‚Ä¶
Clean. Best shower at a truck stop. $12. Food was just ok. Lots of parking.
Nice place. Clean amenities. Can shower here, get a hot meal.
Very clean and large parking. Nice place to stop. Very nice and clean shower.

Truck World seemed like it would have most things that a person on the road would need (laundry, shower, etc.). The only thing I could think of missing might be a small produce section and one of those massage chairs.
Good place for sleeping in shower in eat nice people
So far so good .. have not tried the shower yet..

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Coming in and out of the store using the showers etc no one ever acknowledged me, no one ever said ‚Äúwelcome in‚Äù ‚Äúwelcome to loves‚Äù ‚Äúhave a good day‚Äù nothing and as a trucker I‚Äôve come accustomed to that especially bc I don‚Äôt stay at any ‚Ä¶

It's a pretty good place for a quick shower when on the road and grabbing something to eat. You have subway and McDonald's in there can't go wrong with those. Only downside is parking being a very busy place it's hard to get in a spot even ‚Ä¶

Stopped  in for a shower and the girl said let me clean it, it won't take long.  I watched her through the open door use a towel to just wipe up the water, then take that same towel a wipe off the toilet. She used no disinfectant whatsoever ‚Ä¶

The problem  I have is as trucker.
Our showers don't clean really good
And special the toilet in our shower room our neglect they don't clean them here u have to ask and u get  an attitude by employee when ask to do there job.
We took a shower here, Didnt wait much less then 3 minutes. Very pleased with their showers, clean and nice staff. Plenty of room.
I love Loves and this location is great, I had a nice clean hot shower and Debbie was great, we had a nice conversation, thanks a lotüëç ‚Ä¶

No shower
Not fresh burgers
Nice hot shower, good customer service

a regular stop on my east bound run ,, a shower is  always ready and clean

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped for my 34 so I would be able to take a shower and do laundry only to find out showers are not available and they dont have laundry. Absolutely ridiculous I fight to just have a spot to park at pilot to use my shower credits only to ‚Ä¶
It‚Äôs disrespectfull towards truckers to leave them with no showers, leave at least 1 shower available.

Great place and location! They allowed me to park in their parking lot and sleep in my Wrangler. I felt very safe and for $13 had a great shower in the morning. The shower facilities were very clean and spotless! Very impressed.
Clean updated shower and hot water

Very small. Cashier was very nice. Got a 110 gallons of diesel fuel. Only 1 shower credit. I feel as im getting ripped off. Have over a thousand gallons of diesel fuel this month. No shower power. Guess thats a lie as well. Thinking of just ‚Ä¶
Trucker. Shower time. Clean!

Absolute terd hole, scale has 4 inches of ice on it, after3 minutes in the shower water went ice cold! The guy in 5he shower next to me was talking to an employee and said the hot water drained out! Cashier was honest for no reason said he ‚Ä¶
Terrible truck stop, poor and slow service.A bad ride for trucks and a long wait for the shower, which slowly and lazily clean it up!I would never want to come back here!!!
Their shower doesn't work, only cold water comes out.
People were friendly. Shower sucked because no hot water. Luke warm is not good enough. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
I had a big breakfast with coffee for $10. You can't beat that with a stick. Plenty of parking. Fuel attendent will fuel your truck for you.
If you didn't fuel shower is $5. Very good place to stop.

What a great Independent Truck Stop! If it's not independent, I'm just not aware of Kwik Fill. $5 for a very clean shower! Gentleman at the counter asked me if I got diesel, leading me to believe it would be free if I had! The restaurant is ‚Ä¶
Nice truck stop lots of space even after 8pmüòÖ. Shower $5 you can't beat that ‚Ä¶
